body_html:
@shyzh @jubjamie Did this ever build before? I'm not able to reproduce with a fresh pull.

Maybe try rm -rf gradleBuild/ gradlew gradlew.bat gradle to make sure you don't have incompatible version of gradle cached somewhere then try building again?

body:
@shyzh @jubjamie Did this ever build before? I'm not able to reproduce with a fresh pull.

Maybe try `rm -rf gradleBuild/ gradlew gradlew.bat gradle` to make sure you don't have incompatible version of gradle cached somewhere then try building again?
